verbose_text: The phosphorylation appears to favour the formation of a Cdc37 p50 -Hsp90 - kinase complex and dephosphorylation by PP5 / Ppt1 appears to weaken this association and might act as a signal for progression of the cycle and release of activated client kinase protein [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: phosphorylation appears to favour the formation of a Cdc37
